Text:
After more than 7 days, and over 51GB seeded, this torrent is now out in the wild and independent of me! I hope everyone gets better speeds now, I've been uploading at 100k/sec for over a week. Its sort of annoying that half of what you upload gets wasted, but that's life! 

I will continue to seed for the foreseeable future. Enjoy.

Thank you for this!

@MafiaHansen: 22 episodes, each 1.09 GiB. You do the math. :)
Thank you! As far as I know that's the only place you can find it all in mkv. I just hope to find season 2 as well.

Thank you indeed!
Alredy seen them of course but this is a good show and worth the download to watch again sometime. Again - thanks fot the effort, some of us at least bother to show our gratitude...
Thanks a lot. I missed the first season of this show. So being able to go back and watch it will be fun.
season one is 23 episodes not 22 O.o
